channel.title: Comments on: সহীহ বুখারী কেন মিথ্যাচার (পর্ব ২)
channel.description: জ্ঞান যেখানে সীমাবদ্ধ, যুক্তি যেখানে আড়ষ্ট, মুক্তি সেখানে অসম্ভব

item.title: By: Md. Kohinoor Hossain
item.dc:creator: Md. Kohinoor Hossain
item.description: To see, everyman and every-woman have own characteristic that relies on love that is called religion. In this regard none can deny the real love. Love is truth and truth is beauty is one creator where believe, practice, action and feeling make religion so that all may depend on scansion of ALLAH. From Md. Kohinoor Hossain, Bangladesh
item.content:encoded: To see, everyman and every-woman have own characteristic that relies on love that is called religion. In this regard none can deny the real love. Love is truth and truth is beauty is one creator where believe, practice, action and feeling make religion so that all may depend on scansion of ALLAH. From Md. Kohinoor Hossain, Bangladesh
